review: This little gadget is amazing....all of our movies at the tip of our fingers and a push of a button.
author: Amazon Addict "Customer"

review: Love it.  Works great with my Plex Media Server for local content.
author: Robert Rambo "rrambo"

review: Great product! Hooked right up to my TV. We have not had any issue with Connection! love all the apps! Must Have!
author: C. J. Torres

review: Absolutely love the Fire TV Stick!! So easy to install and so much available. Great product.
author: J Brown

review: We're loving our Amazon Fire TV Stick.  We're a couple in our 60's, and don't have some of the apps that other (younger) people have...Netflix, Roku, etc.  But we enjoy the Prime Movies for free and have found some really good ones that weren't in theaters.  Honestly, we don't watch a lot of movies, so this does the job for us and we're extremely pleased with it.  Set up was easy (even for a 63 year old woman).
author: Scorpio3813
